LanguageData.TemperateForest.label: temperate forest
LanguageData.TemperateForest.description: Forests of deciduous trees interspersed with fertile clearings. Many species of animals move around among the trees and on the plains.
LanguageData.TemperateSwamp.label: temperate swamp
LanguageData.TemperateSwamp.description: Wetlands choked with vegetation and disease. Dense overgrowth makes it hard to move around, and clearing areas for building takes a long time. Much of the terrain is too marshy to support heavy structures.
